com.bmd.jrt.android.runner

Class AndroidRunners

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmd.jrt.android.runner.AndroidRunners

  • public class AndroidRunners
extends Object
    Utility class for creating and sharing runner instances, employing specific Android classes.

    Created by davide on 9/28/14.

      • taskRunner

        @Nonnull
public static Runner taskRunner()
        Returns a runner employing default async tasks.

        Beware of the caveats of using AyncTasks especially on some platform versions.

        Returns:
        the runner instance.

      • taskRunner

        @Nonnull
public static Runner taskRunner(@Nullable
                        Executor executor)
        Returns a runner employing async tasks running on the specified executor.

        Beware of the caveats of using AsyncTasks especially on some platform versions.

        Note also that the executor instance will be ignored on platforms with API level < 11.

        Parameters:
        executor - the executor.
        Returns:
        the runner instance.

      • threadRunner

        @Nonnull
public static Runner threadRunner(@Nonnull
                          HandlerThread thread)
        Returns a runner employing the specified handler thread.
        Parameters:
        thread - the thread.
        Returns:
        the runner instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the specified thread is null.
